ygData.subject: Re: Wizards are fun - don't ruin it for everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: i thought this for a while too but now i am a semi-KSer. please, let me explain: i spent most of my wizards life trying to keep order at the camps. Me being a
ygData.messageBody:
i thought this for a while too but now i am a semi-KSer. please, let me
explain: i spent most of my wizards life trying to keep order at the camps.
Me being a wizard threatened people by saying that if they stole, i could
easily steal every kill from them from then on, and it worked... for a
while. I have tried very hard lately to keep order at camps and nothing
works. so I gave up. I count the number of people in the camp and wait for
that many dervs to spawn, then i take the next one... regardless of who's
"turn" it is. I figure that i have to be at the end of the rotation so
everyone there has already had a turn when i go and the person that whines
to me was on his/her second turn. I guess you can call it killstealing, but
not many get mad because i'm not just stealing everything when i have the
mana... but that's what i do now... i am moving to a new server soon and i
am seriously thinking of just going out and stealing everything i can for
the hell of it. but i don't think i'll do it because i'm a nice guy and that
sucks for everyone else
-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:48 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Wizards are fun - don't ruin it for everyone


>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
>Kill stealing is not the way to make friends for personal or the class as a
>whole. It might serve the purpose of the person at the time, but rest
>assured, those groups/people you steal kills from WILL remember your name
>and later on down the road when you can't cast/melee your ass out of a
>tight spot, if those folks are around they will more than likely just sit
>and watch you get the crap beat out of you til you die and laugh their
>heads off. Sad people think this is okay. I get more exp working with a
>group of 6 than I do alone by far. The bonus for a full group helps a lot
>and if you find the right spots (not telling mine), you will get more than
>enough cash and goodies to go around. We normally have a pile of bodies to
>loot and everyone goes away with their pockets full and their exp bumping
>up nicely...AND a good feeling.
>
>At 04:01 PM 6/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>From: yur@...
>>
>>
>>
>>I probably will get flamed for this for sure, but who cares.
>>
>>I made it all the way to lvl 12 as an erudite wizard. I found that
leveling
>>was very slow indeed and it was getting really boring camping with my
groups
>>till the sun comes up. However, i was on a few days ago in the morning
>>and my
>>regular group wasn't on. I shouted for about 30 min and no one wanted to
join
>>up with me for bandit hunting. Out of boredom, i went down to the bandit
>>camps
>>to see if i can find a group there(West karanas on top of Hill). I found
this
>>group of 6 there camping the bandits so i just sat around shouting for
groups
>>once again. But while those guys were fighting the bandits, i thought, hey
>>might
>>as well try to see if i can kill one solo, if i can't, then they will
probably
>>help me anyways. I attacked one bandit and killedh im in 3 shots with
>>Shock of
>>Lightning. and WOW ! so much XP !!! so i just kept going. I got around
>>10-15
>>pp in 30 min and gained 1 bubble of xp. normall i gain 1 bubble in 6-8
>>hours of
>>playing. FINALLY ! i found how to have fun with my wizard and not be the
>>lamer
>>that spent all his time trying to group and get shitty XP cuz of the split
>>between members !! who cares if they think i am a kill stealer, its not
like
>>they can do anything about it HAHAHA. too bad for them that they wont
group
>>with me. I also found some wizards are really stupid, the group of 6 i
was
>>stealing from had a lvl 14 wizard and a lvl 11 wizard. and none of them
could
>>stop me from stealing. its odd but true... ppl just don't think.. oh
well.. i
>>hope you all try to just have fun and not give a shit what other ppl think
for
>>once. then you might find why Varent say we are a balanced race, i
>>personally
>>think we were made to give grief to others heehhe.. j/k I personally
>>think we
>>should be changed to Erudite Magical Theives hehe..
>>
>>
>>
